Plugin./hhn helpmessage: Sends the flag for the next train mob into chat
Plugin./hhc helpmessage: Counter window -- for counter-based S ranks

Map.MapImageCheckboxToolTip:
Use a map image instead of blank background

		=======================================
		Map Images Created By Cable Monkey of Goblin
         		   http://cablemonkey.us/huntmap2/
         		   Same thing for spawn point data :D
		=======================================

If map images aren't showing, please verify that you have the images downloaded in your plugins folder.
Map.BackgroundScanCheckboxToolTip:
Allows Hunt Helper to scan while GUI inactive.
Enables notifications, recording Train, etc. while this main map window is inactive.
Map.LoadedHuntDataButtonToolTip: Show the loaded hunt and spawn point data
Map.ZoneNameCheckboxToolTip:
Shows Zone Name
Adjust position below as % of window.
Map.DragWidgetToolTip: Ctrl+Click to enter manually, Shift+Drag to speed up.
Map.AlternateColourToolTip: Alternate colour for when map image is used.
Map.WorldNameCheckboxToolTip:
Shows World Name
Adjust position below as % of window
Map.WindowColourToolTip: Window Colour - Opacity can be changed down below.
Map.SavePresetToolTip:
Save a preset for quick switching - Size, opacity, position, and use map

Apply with command: /hh1 /hh2
Save with /hh1save /hh2save or -->
Map.AllModifierToolTip:
Increase all icons proportionally, default: 1
By Default, A Mob icon is 1.5x a Spawn Point, a Player icon is 0.2x a Spawn Point
Map.DetectionCircleModifierToolTip: Default represents 2 in-game coordinates. Modify if you feel this is inaccurate, default: 1.0
Map.PlayerBackgroundToolTip:
Background of the player / detection circle.
Change the Alpha A: for opacity.
Map.ChatMessageLabelToolTip: Message to send to chat using /echo, usable tags: <flag> <name> <rank> <hpp>
Map.TTSMessageLabelToolTip: Message to use with Text-to-Speech, usable tags: <name> <rank>
Map.FlyTextToolTip:
FlyText is the type of text that appears when you attack something or are attacked.
(e.g. Crit, Miss, Resist)

Enabling this will show a coloured FlyText notification near the middle of your screen.
Map.VisualHelpToolTip:
Draws a 'quest pointer' type thingy, it's a bit glitchy but works well enough
Change size in settings
Map.PointerSizeToolTip: Size modifier for the diamond pointer
Map.AvailableTagsToolTip:
DOUBLE CLICK to easily highlight a tag option for copy and paste.  
-- ONLY <name> and <rank> work with TTS
Map.PriorityMobToolTip:
The big thing that labels highest rank mob in zone, S/SS > A > B

Ctrl+Click to enter manually, Shift+Click for fast drag.
Map.MobInfoColourToolTip:
Main = without map, Alt = with map images,

- Turn up Alpha A: for solid colour.
Map.NearbyMobListToolTip: A list of all nearby mobs.
Map.DefaultSettingsWindowMessage:
There's nothing here
Options are available from the main map window,
Map.ImageDownloadingMessage:
Attempting to download, please wait.

If there seems to be a problem, please manually download from:
Map.ImageDownloadErrorMessageTwo:
Please download the images manually,
 or try deleting the Images/Map folder + RESET PLUGIN, and attempt download again:
Map.ImageDownloadErrorButton: Okay, Don't Show Me This Again. Thanks.
Map.ImageDownloadPromptMessage:
Could not find map images
This is expected if this is your first time.
Would you like to try to download them? (~23.2MB)
Map.ImageDownloadManualMessageOne: Or you can view and manually download from:

HuntTrain.CopyText:
Copy export code clipboard.
Warning: The code will be too long to be pasted into in-game chat. Share via Discord.
HuntTrain.TeleportToolTip: Teleport will initiate even if you are closer to the mob / on the same map. pls adjust thx
HuntTrain.HowTo:
HOW TO:

Background
Click on any of the rows to send the relevant Map Link into chat. (Drag to reorder the list)

Click on the checkbox to mark a mob as dead.

Use the command "/hhn" to automatically mark the current selected as dead, and send the next Map link into chat.
(you will have to click the first one manually)

*Does not allow duplicates (currently does not handle instances or different worlds) - Only records A ranks.
HuntTrain.LastSeenToolTip: Show how long since the hunt was found.
HuntTrain.OpenMapToolTip: Open the relevant map when /hhn used or when name clicked.
HuntTrain.TeleButtonsToolTip:
Show teleport buttons.
Probably best to use this instead of tele on click.
HuntTrain.TeleportOnClickToolTip:
Initiate teleport to closest Aetheryte when hunt is clicked.
This will begin tele even if you try to reorder or click just for chat link.
HuntTrain.TeleportOnCommand: Initiate teleport to closest Aetheryte when /hhn used.
HuntTrain.TeleportWindowMessage:
Teleporting requires the Teleporter Plugin by Pohky.
Please install it via /xlplugins or uncheck teleport options.
HuntTrain.DeleteWindowMessage: Are you sure you want to DELETE train data?
HuntTrain.ImportWindowErrorMessage:
Nothing to import - or incorrect code

The export code is too long to be shared via in-game chat. Please share through Discord or something.
HuntTrain.ImportAllCheckboxToolTip: Overwrites current data with imported data
HuntTrain.UpdateLastSeenCheckboxToolTip: Imports new mobs and updates old mobs Last Seen times, if applicable

SpawnPointFinder.CopyTextAllExport: Export all currently recorded map data
SpawnPointFinder.FilterToolTip:
Used for recording taken spawn positions.
Helpful for position-specific spawns such as
Nandi, Gamma, Tarchia, Burfulululu, Narrow-Rift, etc

Data persists and is saved to file,
Turning recording off will reset tracked data.
You can manually toggle a spawn point by double clicking on the map.
SpawnPointFinder.StopRecording: Stop Recording -- This will WIPE all data.
SpawnPointFinder.StopRecordingAll: Stop Recording All -- This will WIPE all data.
SpawnPointFinder.ErrorMessage: Nothing to import - or incorrect code
SpawnPointFinder.OverwriteButtonToolTip: Import and Overwrite current data for these maps
